scripts.build:docker: yarn run env:dev && docker compose build
scripts.start: yarn run env:dev && docker compose up
scripts.test:unit-voting: yarn run env:test && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace vote test
scripts.test:unit-submit: yarn run env:test && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace submit test
scripts.test:unit-lib: yarn run env:test && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace lib test
scripts.test:e2e: yarn run env:test && docker compose up -d && cross-env ENV_PATH=./.env dotenv -- yarn workspace e2e test
